Text:
It is good, I just finished downloading it.  The ONLY bad thing is that it does not contain any images :(

@Raptor887: You have done a great work.  Thank you a lot for this.  If you can, next time please upload it with picture.  It will be more interesting.  You can compress the images also or reduce the size to save space.  Anyway thanks a lot and I will download it again in about 10 months( it will be called wikipedia 2013 then I think ;) ).
